nhc_headline: ...THREAT OF HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING TO CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS  CENTRAL AMERICA...
summary:
...THREAT OF HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING TO CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS  CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 1:00 PM CDT Tue Oct 31
 the center of Pilar was located near 11.4, -89.8
 with movement ENE at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.
